case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
quoteText:
As available and except as limited under applicable law, the rights afforded to individuals are:

  • Right of access - the right to be informed of, and request access to, the personal data we process about you;
  • Right to rectification - the right to request that we amend or update your personal data where it is inaccurate or incomplete;
  • Right to erasure - the right to request that we delete your personal data;

case: You can retrieve an archive of your data
quoteText: Right to data portability - the right to request a copy of your personal data in electronic format and the right to transmit that personal data for use in another party’s service.

case: You can opt out of promotional communications
quoteText: Notification Settings (accessed via your account page) - allows you to choose which marketing communications you receive from Spotify. You may toggle these settings to opt in or out of receiving different types of email and push notifications. Please note that email marketing messages from Spotify include an opt-out mechanism within the message itself (e.g. an unsubscribe link in the emails we send to you). Clicking on the link in an email will opt you out of further messages of that category (e.g. Artist Updates). You can use the Notification Settings page to exercise choices about all categories of email and push marketing communication.

case: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure

case: Voice data is collected and shared with third-parties
quoteText:
What does Spotify do with the voice data it collects?

Spotify uses this data to recognise what you say, to understand you better and to help us provide a response or take an action. Spotify may also use and share this data in other ways, which are described in our Privacy Policy. For example, using your data to improve voice functionality on Spotify, to develop new voice features, and to help us provide you with advertising that is more relevant to you. It also includes sharing information, from time to time, with our service providers
